text: Keh dijiye kay tum humaray baray mein jiss cheez ka intizar ker rahey ho woh do bhalaeeyon mein say aik hai aur hum tumharay haq mein iss ka intizar kertay hain kay ya to Allah Taalaa apney pass say koi saza tumhen dey ya humaray hathon say pus aik taraf tum muntazir raho doosri janib tumharay sath hum bhi muntazir hain
